title: 2015 World Final Tickets - Second Wave August

embed.description: It all comes down to this, the final event of the 2015 World Championship. It's time for the ultimate showdown in Berlin between the top two teams who will face-off to be crowned world champions. Here's the important information that you need to secure your seat at Finals below: Q: When do Finals tickets go on sale?

body:
Hi everyone :) 
So as the Initial wave was sold out in 5 minutes and i did not get any Tickets i was wondering if I can try again, as Riot said they will say remaining Tickets in August. 
Sincerely Helmi56.
